price: 15. Marka Aayadahayaga loo akhriyo, yidhaahda: Waa sheekooyinkii kuwii hore.
arabic: إِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: idhā tut'lā ʿalayhi āyātunā qāla asāṭīru al-awalīna
